delivery-date.required: 1. This is a required field and must be completed
delivery-date.numeric: 1. Please enter the date as day, month and year.
delivery-date.future: 1. Date cannot be in the future
delivery-date.format: 1. Please enter the date as day, month and year.

received.required: 1. This is a required field and must be completed

no-letter.label: I don't have the letter anymore

delivery-details.label: If you think the courier may have had a problem delivering items to this address (for example there is no number on the door) then let us know and we will contact the courier.

address-street.label: House name or number and street

no-email.label: I do not have an email address

first-name-error.label: What is your correct first name?
first-name-error.title: This is the first line of name on your BRP card

last-name-error.label: What is your correct last name?
last-name-error.title: This is the last line of name on your BRP card

date-of-birth-error.label: What is your correct date of birth?

birth-place-error.label: What is your correct place of birth?

sponsor-details-error.title: This is the third line of remark on the front of your BRP card. These are details from your employer of university or college
sponsor-details-error.label: What is the correct sponsor reference?

signature-error.label: What is wrong with your signature?

photograph-error.label: What is wrong with your photograph?

conditions-error.label: This includes wrong expiry date, leave duration, remarks on front and on the back of the card.

journey.header: My BRP has not been delivered

one.header: Have you received a letter from the Home Office telling you your biometrics residence permit was being delivered to you by a courier?

list.one: your biometric residence permit (BRP) is going to be delivered
list.two: your application to stay in the UK was successful

one.date-question: What is the date on the letter?

four.subheader: We need your contact details to reply to your enquiry about why you have not received a BRP.

address.title: Please provide your address so that we contact you by post

confirmation.header: Thank you, we have received the information you have provided. We are now looking into this.
confirmation.privacy: We keep your personal data secure according to our privacy policy.
confirmation.email: We have sent you an email containing the information you have provided to

para.one: We will now review the information you provided to find out why you have not received the biometric residence permit.
para.two: We will get back to you within 5 working days. For example, if you contact us on a Monday you will hear back by the following Monday.
para.three: We will then advise you what to do next.

about-error.header: Tell us about the error on your BRP
about-error.subheader: You can select one or more options if needed.

contact-details.subheader: We need your contact details to reply to your enquiry about why you have not received a BRP.

address.title: Please provide your address so that we contact you by post

same-address.header: Is your address the same as on the Home Office letter saying your application to remain in the UK was successful?

personal-details.subheader: Complete this section carefully as these details will help us to find your information.

check-details-delivery.subheader: Check through the information that you have provided to make sure it is correct. If it is incorrect you can change it here.

footer.title: Send your submission
footer.explanation: By sending us your details you confirm that the information you have provided is true and that you accept our terms and conditions and privacy policy.hared with other government departments.

check-details-error.subheader: Check through the information that you have provided to make sure it is correct. If it is still incorrect you can change it here.

footer.title: Send your submission
footer.explanation: By sending us your details you confirm that the information you have provided is true and that you accept our terms and conditions and privacy policy.hared with other government departments.
